flawed_nl_solution:
Each person brought 5 bags * 50 pounds per bag = <<5*50=250>>250 pounds per person.
There are 6 people * 250 pounds per person = <<6*250=1050>>1050 pounds of luggage on the plane.
The plan can hold 6000 pounds - 1050 pounds = <<6000-1050=4950>>4950 pounds of luggage space left.
The plane can hold an additional 4950 pounds / 50 pounds per bag = <<4950/50=99>>99 pieces of luggage.
#### 99

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 1050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
